en: You've been working so hard on your freelance jobs that you feel a bit worse for wear.
Then a brilliant idea occurs to you: why not call in sick and dedicate the entire day to working for yourself?
Your boss wouldn't be happy, but you'd be able to get something done without stressing yourself out.

You feel a bit like a kid who got out of school early. The boost completely shifts your mood, and you're able to get a lot done and have a good time doing it! Then the phone rings, an unknown number. You don't answer, and feel a little guilty and worried.
You're a person of integrity. You don't lie or take the easy way out just because you can. Unfortunately, your body and work suffers for it.
